en.av_c1: We can make our list display notation more clear by showing the position of the current element. We will use a vertical bar like this:
en.av_c2: This example shows a list of four elements, with the current position being to the right of the bar at element 12.
en.av_c3: Given this configuration, calling insert with value 10 will change the list to be:
en.av_c4: Here is another example, showing the current position set to allow insertion at the end of the list.
en.av_c5: Here is the result of inserting 17.
